snippet: Development of the drug, aleglitazar, was discontinued after Roche cited concerns about safety and effectiveness.
abstract: Roche discontinues development of potentially important diabetes drug aleglitazar, move that could raise safety questions about entire category of drugs, which includes controversial medicine Avandia.
lead_paragraph: Development of the drug, aleglitazar, was discontinued after Roche cited concerns about safety and effectiveness.

headline.main: Roche Stops Developing a New Drug for Diabetes
headline.print_headline: Roche Stops Developing A New Drug For Diabetes
